vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Νικάνωρ, -ορος, ὁ
Nicanor: Act.6:5.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.6.5
§ Nicanor, "victor"
Nicanor, (Proper name), Acts 6:5*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
尼迦挪 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "征服者"
耶路撒冷教會中七個執事之一 (徒 6:5)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
尼迦挪 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "征服者"
耶路撒冷教会中七个执事之一 (徒 6:5)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ni-ca-no, Ni-ca-nô. Xem G3528 và G435.
